summary: Weapon versions of numerous miscellaneous tools, like hammers, hoes, embalming tools, and now saws and lumber hooks.
descriptionHtml:
Numerous \"tool\" weapons, like hammers, chisels, lockpicks, shovels, and more, which are craftable at any forge under Wood or Iron, no perks required. They can then be tempered at a sharpening wheel and enchanted. Now includes embalming tools! (Except for the scissors. I couldn\'t get them to not look silly.)

Just think, an enchanted legendary shovel called Gravedigger! I don\'t HAVE to think, because I made that in testing. I also made a soul trapping hoe called the Gardener of Men and a dual-chisel set called Tippy and Tappy. Imagine the cringe-inducing puns YOU can come up with! 

Thanks to LiveStyleGaming for the great review!

This mod doesn\'t change or replace any objects, just adds the items and their recipes. The tools should have balanced stats, although I\'m still working that out.

Also available on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=129444300
author: Crysthala

files.name: Weaponized Tools
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed busted crafting recipes.
Fixed BSA archive that might have caused missing meshes.
